channel.title: Spoilers
channel.description: Well looks like moparisthebest.com/smf is going through alot of changes for the better, and looks pretty nice. With that said, I would like to request a new BB code tag we can use in our posts... "Spoilers". I feel we can use them because it can tidy up ALOT of threads, you know... the ones with billions of pictures and stuff. I mean its used ALOT in VBulletin and there are simple mods easily acquirable from Simplemachines.org (not advertising). Alot of people can use this for a more "professional" feel and look on their threads. With that said, I really hope you consider making the modification because it can significantly impact this forum in a great way.

item.title: Spoilers

item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

Well looks like moparisthebest.com/smf is going through alot of changes for the better, and looks pretty nice. With that said, I would like to request a new BB code tag we can use in our posts… “Spoilers”. I feel we can use them because it can tidy up ALOT of threads, you know… the ones with billions of pictures and stuff. I mean its used ALOT in VBulletin and there are simple mods easily acquirable from Simplemachines.org (not advertising). Alot of people can use this for a more “professional” feel and look on their threads. With that said, I really hope you consider making the modification because it can significantly impact this forum in a great way.
